title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 2103.5 - Service of papers
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 2103.5 - Service of papers

State Regulations

Any notice, order or other process or paper directed to
the person named in the registration statement as the landlord at the address
given therein, or where a notice of change in identity has been filed, to the
person named as landlord and at the address given in the most recent such
notice, shall constitute notice to the person who is then the
landlord. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
2103.5

Amended

New

York State Register November 8, 2023/Volume XLV, Issue 45, eff. 11/8/2023

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
